author: Lucien Bruggeman
title: Amid coronavirus uncertainty, Florida town puts some hope in smart thermometers
description: Leaders across the country are struggling to make decisions with major public health and economic implications – often without solid information to guide them.
content:
As Americas oldest city, St. Augustine, Florida, draws visitors from around the country. Hospitality is the economy, as city manager John Regan likes to say -- local businesses rely on an influx of tourists and spring breakers this time of year to survive.
